= Systems =

A list of current systems, in table format using the [http://datatables.net/ datatables api] for additional features.

== Features ==

Previous features that will be continued:
  * Listing of systems with signatures
  * System details like signatures, static connections, jumps ect.
  * Quick reference to the last hour's activity

Additional features:
  * Ability to "favorite" systems to always be listed
  * Sorting any columns and saving this sort (applying to new systems)
  * Searching list - including class, effect etc
